channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.description: Web responsive design Referenced by CodeCademy Intro Responsive design refers to the ability of a website to resize and reorganize > its content based on: The size of other content on the website The size of the screen the website is being viewed on Notes from codecademy em represents the size of the base font being used. The default font size in a browser is 16 pixels.

零散笔记 2018-4-19 du 就是 disk usage 命令 linux du -d 1 -h 查看 depth 为 1 的文件夹的存贮大小 2018-4-20 boilerplate: 样板 eg: a boilerplate to use in CS-546 assignments exert: 发挥 exerts some control over the alignment of items when they overflow the line learning bootstrap A complete Guide to FlexBox Properties for the flex containers .container { display: flex; flex-direction: row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse flex-wrap: nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse flex-flow: row | nowrap (default); justify-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | space-evenly; align-items: flex-start | flex-end | stretch | center | baseline align-content: flex-start | flex-end | stretch | center | space-between | space-around } Properties for the flex items
